Description: Finalize Datum as a compliance system of record with auditor-ready reports and governed standards profile lifecycle.
Generate formal auditor-facing compliance reports suitable for AS9100 ISO 13485 and NASA reviews.
Define standard report sections: scope standards coverage deviations overrides approvals and traceability.
Generate PDF and HTML reports from approved plans and profile stacks.
Include matrix mapping plan steps to standards clauses.
Explicitly list overrides justifications approvers and dates.
Introduce lifecycle states for standards profiles similar to plan approvals.
Add draft submitted approved deprecated states for profiles.
Add submit approve reject endpoints for standards profiles.
Prevent modification of approved profiles.
Track versions of standards profiles with full audit history.
Add version identifiers and parent references to profiles.
Support comparison between profile versions.
Expose GET endpoints to retrieve profile versions and diffs.
Support grouping profiles by program customer or contract.
Define bundle schema referencing multiple profiles.
Allow SOE runs to select a bundle instead of individual profiles.
Ensure compliance trace reflects bundle membership.
Expose auditor-grade compliance and profile lifecycle views in Ops UI.
Allow users to view generated compliance reports in UI.
Add UI controls for submitting approving and viewing profiles.
Display profile version history and diffs.
Strengthen export artifacts to survive external audits.
Include cryptographic hash for exported travelers and reports.
Embed plan version profile stack and approvals in exports.
Ensure exported artifacts cannot be regenerated after revocation.
Expand red-team tests for audit and profile lifecycle abuse.
Prevent using deprecated or draft profiles in production plans.
Block report or export generation without full approvals.
Provide auditor-facing documentation and internal playbooks.
Document how to navigate Datum during an audit.
Document internal rules for profile and plan governance.
